patthana15.19:1.1_0: Hetuṁ atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naatītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.19:2.1_0: Hetuṁ anāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.19:3.1_0: Hetuṁ paccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu napaccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
